scripts.build: node tools/generate-llms.js 2>nul || echo. & npx vite build
scripts.build:clean: npm run clean:dist && npm run build
scripts.clean: npm run clean:dist && npm run clean:android && npm run clean:cache
scripts.android: npm run build:clean && npx cap sync && npx cap run android
scripts.android:live: npm run build:clean && npx cap sync && npx cap run android -l
scripts.android:studio: npm run build:clean && npx cap sync && npx cap open android
scripts.android:build: npm run build:clean && npx cap sync && cd android && gradlew.bat clean && gradlew.bat assembleDebug
scripts.android:build-release: npm run build:clean && npx cap sync && cd android && gradlew.bat clean && gradlew.bat assembleRelease
scripts.android:build-aab: npm run build:clean && npx cap sync && cd android && gradlew.bat clean && gradlew.bat bundleRelease
scripts.android:sync: npm run build:clean && npx cap sync
scripts.deploy:functions: npx supabase functions deploy send-push-notification && npx supabase functions deploy create-payment-intent && npx supabase functions deploy share-report && npx supabase functions deploy og-image
scripts.deploy:edge_function:prod: npx supabase functions deploy send-push-notification --project-ref mrejgpcxaevooofyenzq
scripts.build:prod: npm run clean:dist && npm run clean:android && npm run build && timeout /t 2 /nobreak >nul 2>&1 & npx cap sync && cd android && gradlew.bat clean && gradlew.bat assembleRelease
scripts.build:prod:aab: npm run clean:dist && npm run clean:android && npm run build && npx cap sync && cd android && gradlew.bat clean && gradlew.bat bundleRelease
scripts.build:standalone: npm run clean:dist && npm run clean:android && npm run build && npx cap sync && cd android && gradlew.bat clean && gradlew.bat assembleRelease
scripts.build:standalone:aab: npm run clean:dist && npm run clean:android && npm run build && npx cap sync && cd android && gradlew.bat clean && gradlew.bat bundleRelease
